dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1,238 sentences for aspect-based sentiment analysis, with 705 sentences classified as positive, 30 as negative, 17 as neutral, 426 as positive, 313 as negative, 782 as neutral, 375 as positive, 247 as negative, and 189 as neutral.
dcterms:title: Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis Dataset
